alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 06 at 4:14AM CST until March 06 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Burnett, Washburn, Douglas and Bayfield Counties. In Minnesota, Pine County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band and the Mille Lacs Band, Lena Lake and, Hinckley areas. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
